title: Emerald and Diamond Navratna Haar: A Regal Statement Piece
features: This exquisitely crafted Haar features a central Emerald in a striking emerald cut, surrounded by brilliant-cut diamonds. The design incorporates Amethyst gemstones for a modern 'Navratna' (నవరత్న) interpretation, blending traditional auspiciousness with contemporary elegance. Delicate diamond floral motifs link the gemstone sections. The pendant showcases a cascading arrangement of Emerald and Diamond clusters. Finished with fine Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
occasions: Important festivals like Diwali and Ugadi
description: A captivating blend of traditional South Indian design and modern sensibilities. The vibrant Emerald and sparkling Diamonds create a mesmerizing effect. This Haar is a symbol of prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and quality.
